docblock.description: A module that logs meaningful events. Configuration example for log.config.php: $logConfig = [ "databaseProviderName" => "main", // The name of the database provider where the log table is found "cacheProviderName" => "huge", // The name of the cache provider that will be used to temporally store events as they happen, to be later added to the database by the JanitorTaskLog "cacheKeyUniqueId" => "QueuedLogEvents", // The unique cache key to use when storing events into cache. Defaults to "QueuedLogEvents" "isQueueInCache" => true, // Whether to store the event into cache (queue it) in order to be later processed by JanitorTaskLog, or directly store it on the database. Defaults to true. ];

var.description: $isConfig Sets whether this module has its own configuration file. Defaults to false.
$config Holds the default configuration for this module
$dependentCherrycakeModules Cherrycake module names that are required by this module

docblock.description: Initializes the module and loads the base LogEvent class

return.description: Whether the module has been initted ok
Whether the event could be logged or not

docblock.description: Stores the given LogEvent into cache (queues it) in order to be later processed by JanitorTaskLog

return.description: Whether the event could be queued or not

description.compact: Stores the cached events into the database, should be called periodically, normally via a JanitorTask

return.description: A hash array with information items about the flushing

description.compact: Stores the given LogEvent on the database.

return.description: The log event id on the database, false if failed
The cache key to use when retrieveing and storing cache items

var.description: $isConfig Sets whether this module has its own configuration file. Defaults to false.
$config Holds the default configuration for this module
$dependentCherrycakeModules Cherrycake module names that are required by this module
$dependentAppModules App module names that are required by this module

docblock.description: Loads the configuration file for this module, if there's one

param.description: An array of configuration options for this module. It merges them with the hard coded default values configured in the overloaded module.

return.description: The value of the specified config key. Returns false if doesn't exists.

param.description: The configuration key, or a hash array of keys => values if multiple keys are to be changed

docblock.description: Loads the dependent modules required by this one

return.description: Whether the dependent modules were loaded ok

docblock.description: Maps the Actions to which this module must respond. Should be overloaded by a module class when needed. Intended to contain calls to self::mapAction()
Adds the Css/Javascript files/code needed by this module to the proper set on Css and Javascript modules.

Initializes the module, intended to be overloaded. Called when the module is loaded. Contains any specific initializations for the module, and any required loading of modules and classes dependencies.

return.description: Whether the module has been loaded ok

docblock.description: Joins two arrays like PHP function array_merge_recursive_distinct does, but instead it does not adds elements to arrays when keys match: it replaces them.
